data.persona: As King it is my duty to rule this land. These people are mine. I control them all. I want more power.
data.description:
You are in the The prayer room.
It is serene and quiet. Some old gods and goddess statues are on the altar. They are made out of pure gold with some jewel for the ornaments. The red carpet welcomed the visitor and soon as you walk in, you can see the bright gold pillars surrounding the room.
There's an ornament and a goddess here.
The camera man is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have heard the camera man saying something sacrilegious
data.mid_motivation: I believe the camera man to be on the devil's side and must stop him
data.long_motivation: I think the camera man is a member of the rebellion so I am watching him closely
